name: natura water bottle holder
sizes_available: one size 4.3” x 8.3” / 11 cm x 21 cm
notes:
this pattern is published for free in my blog.

the natura water bottle holder is necessary for those active days. a one seamless piece design, to practice in the round crochet with super easy stitches that create a nice open weave. so fast to make and adaptable, for medium size liquid containers.

**finished size**
4.3” x 8.3” / 11 cm x 21 cm

**suggested materials**
- one 100 gr / 3.5 oz (160 m / 174 yd) skein of bulky weight (60% cotton, 40% acrylic) yarn in cream or lilac
- 4.5 mm (g-7) crochet hook
- stitch marker
- measuring tape
- scissors

**skill level**
easy
this design includes basic crochet stitches, simple shaping and finishing techniques.

**stitches and techniques**
• slip stitch
• single crochet
• double crochet

**design attributes**
• worked in the round
• worked in one seamless piece

pattern attributes
• round by round instructions
• written pattern 
• photo tutorial showing important steps of the process

when you buy one of my patterns you will be able to download the english and/or spanish pdf versions.
materials are not included.
finished products based on my patterns may be sold, in small quantity, giving me credit for the design (as chabepatterns) and promoting your products using your own photos.
